sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: sectionTitle
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, will use the page title.

sub_fields.label: Eyebrow
sub_fields.name: sectionEyebrow
sub_fields.instructions: Text above the title in smaller font.

sub_fields.label: Image Size
sub_fields.name: image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Cover will stretch the image to fill the viewport at all times. Contain scales the image to maintain its aspect ratio while fitting within the viewport.

sub_fields.label: Image Background Color
sub_fields.name: image_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: (Option Override) - When the image size is set to contain, there are certain viewports where the image will not fill the entire area. By default the color of this area is the most dominant color in the image. This allows you to override that color to something specific.

sub_fields.label: Layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: In the Half Width style, the background will be aligned to the chosen side.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: If you choose not to have a background color overlay, this allows you to select the color of the text for this section.

sub_fields.label: Navigation Title
sub_fields.name: navigationTitle
sub_fields.instructions: By default Page Navigation will use the Section title unless you override it here.
